price: Na akawa mwema kwa wazazi wake, wala hakuwa jabari muasi
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
